description:
QUICK-EZE CHEWY PMNT MP 24TAB

Chewy QUICK-EZE Peppermint Flavour antacid tablets help provide rapid relief from heartburn and acid indigestion by neutralising stomach acid fast. Proudly made in Australia, Chewy QUICK-EZE Peppermint Flavour antacid tablets contain active ingredient Calcium Carbonate, and no artificial colours. Each pack contains 24 tablets, conveniently packed in 3 sticks of 8, perfect to take on-the-go. Heartburn and Indigestion can be triggered by a number of factors such as lifestyle, diet and pregnancy. You can help prevent Heartburn & Indigestion by avoiding spicy, fatty or greasy foods; eating in moderation; lowering your stress levels; and not eating late at night.

Provides rapid relief from heartburn and acid indigestion by neutralising stomach acid fast. ; With active ingredient Calcium Carbonate ; No artificial colours. ; Made in Australia ; 24 individually wrapped tablets, packed in 3 sticks of 8

Made in Australia

24 individually wrapped tablets, packed in 3 sticks of 8
name: Quick-eze Heartburn & Indigestion Relief Chewy Peppermint 24 Pack
